name: Clock Drawing Test

tasks.name: Clock Drawing Test
tasks.instruction: Please copy the clock face below, showing 10 minutes past 10.

healthNotice: Receiving a negative test result can be concerning. While this test is not a definitive diagnosis, we strongly recommend consulting with a healthcare professional specializing in Alzheimer's and dementia for a comprehensive evaluation.

Early intervention can make a significant difference, and a specialist can provide you with the appropriate guidance and support. For more information on how to seek professional help, you may visit the Alzheimer's Association <'Find Support'> page
healthStates: The test predicted, that you are a healthy person, with an accuracy of <percent>%.
The test predicted, that you might have mild Alzheimer's disease, with an accuracy of <percent>%
The test predicted, that you might have moderate Alzheimer's disease, with an accuracy of <percent>%
